messages.subject: What is this list?
messages.msgSnippet: ... I think this is what is bothering me most. The list really had found a good, helpful, fun, unschooling tone. It s gone now. That s hard for this old-timer
messages.messageBody:
>>It was doing fabulously before you came along to try to fix what wasn't
>>broken.
>
>Joyce
>Unschooling-dotcom moderator>>

I think this is what is bothering me most. The list really had found a good,
helpful, fun, unschooling tone. It's gone now. That's hard for this
old-timer (geezer?) to take right now. Maybe it's just a thing that these
kind of lists have to go through now and again. As a Taoist, I do understand
that sh*t happens. We've just gotta get through it and get past it.

Life is good.
~Mary
